Articles.Content:
Hello,

since a short time (since a few weeks) I have problems with my screen. When I open KSP and press alt+enter to switch the screen to full screen, I have an approximately 10 cm thick black border on my screen on both sides. Could someone please help me fix the problem?
Change the in-game settings to fullscreen mode so it's like that all the time? Main menu settings > graphics > toggle fullscreen mode.
Ok imma try it. Lets see if it works.
It worked. Thanks for your help.
